Title: Means of Ingress
Description:
Ah, look at you! Just the sort of rogue element I need.

My name is Ar'syn, and I am something of a connoisseur for the fine arts and histories of our people. It is my intent to enter the Royal Preservatory--that's that large enclave just over there-- and rob it blind.

But gracious, the guards will never let me get close enough to survey their security! If only I had someone to help me find a somewhat more subtle way into the building.

<Ar'syn looks at you meaningfully.>
ObjectivesText: Survey three potential entryways into the Royal Preservatory.
RewardText:
Say what you will about our new queen, but she knows how to run a tight ship. They are ferrying their spoils of war into the building at a remarkable rate.

But then, that may well be your ticket inside.
